text: Nancy Elaine Achin Sullivan (January 20, 1959 â€“ February 25, 2022) was an American Republican politician. She represented the 1st Middlesex district in the Massachusetts Senate from 1991 to 1993. Sullivan was born in Lowell, Massachusetts. She retired after a single term in 1993 because she was having chemotherapy to treat breast cancer. Sullivan died on February 25, 2022 in Andover, Massachusetts at the age of 63. ==References== Category:1959 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Deaths from breast cancer Category:Members of the Massachusetts General Court Category:Politicians from Massachusetts Category:People from Lowell, Massachusetts Category:Republican Party (United States) politicians
title: Nancy Achin Sullivan
